Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key1: Do log ko mil kar sabse pehle yeh videos dekhni hai
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key2: Ab aapko 30 mins ke liye aapas mei english mei inn topics ke baarein mei baat karni hai.
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key3: Baat karte karte, aap observe karein, ki aap kitne tech words use kar paa rahe hai.
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key4: Aur agar aapka partner koi aisa tech word bolta hai, jo aapko nahi pata, ya aap generally use nahi kartein. Inn words ko bhi samajhne ki phir koshish karein.
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key5: Iss discussion ko karte hue, aap inn points ke baarein mei bhi soch sakte hai:
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key9: .Agar aap ko aur thoda samajhna hai, toh yeh dekhiye
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key11: 1 - Aap subtitles/captions on kar sakte hai, YouTube Video dekhte hue
Tech_Samvaad_cookie_key12: 2 - Aap speed kam ya jyada kar sakte hai, video ke liye, jisse ki aap acche se dekh payein
